TopicTitle: My rocket moves on its own. (Not flipping)

Articles.Content:
Spoiler

My rockets move in orbit. I noticed that on the botton left part of my screen near the stage button my roll, pitch, and yaw have purple arrows point in different directions from the orange ones. What is happening, and how do i fix it?

You have accidentally set the trim. That’s what the purple makers represent. I think it gets set when you press in on the thumb stick while maneuvering. Since you also press in on the thumb stick to change cameras this can result in inadvertently setting the trim. I’d recommend going in to settings and turning trim off entirely. I did that a long time ago because I was having the same problem which I why I don’t remember exactly how it gets set.

Not sure about other controls. I'm on Cursor mode and it sets the trim if you are holding LB +  a directional input.

To reset hold LB+tap A button. 

Or equivalent for PlayStation controls.
